title: Do you suffer from IBS? This doctor says 'gravity intolerance' may be to blame
description: By bringing gravity into the equation, we can focus on effective strategies for managing IBS in space and on Earth.
content: By bringing gravity into the equation, we can focus on effective strategies for managing IBS in space and on Earth.
